info.title: ProjectX Gateway API
info.description: ProjectX Trading, LLC - Gateway API for prop firms and evaluation providers. Provides account customization, risk rules & monitoring, liquidations, statistics and robust permissioning.

BearerAuth.description: JSON Web Token obtained from /api/Auth/loginKey or /api/Auth/loginApp. Tokens are valid for 24 hours.

success.description: Indicates if the request was successful

apiKey.description: The API key obtained from your firm

token.description: JWT session token valid for 24 hours

balance.description: The current balance of the account

canTrade.description: Whether the account is eligible for trading

isVisible.description: Whether the account should be visible

simulated.description: Whether the account is simulated or live

onlyActiveAccounts.description: Whether to filter only active accounts

activeContract.description: Whether the contract is currently active

searchText.description: The name of the contract to search for

live.description: Whether to search for contracts using the sim/live data subscription

contracts.description: Returns up to 20 contracts at a time

contractId.description: The id of the contract to search for

live.description: Whether to retrieve bars using the sim or live data subscription

startTime.description: The start time of the historical data

endTime.description: The end time of the historical data

unitNumber.description: The number of units to aggregate

limit.description: The maximum number of bars to retrieve (max 20000)

includePartialBar.description: Whether to include a partial bar representing the current time unit

accountId.description: The account associated with the order

contractId.description: The contract ID on which the order is placed

symbolId.description: The symbol ID corresponding to the contract

creationTimestamp.description: The timestamp when the order was created

updateTimestamp.description: The timestamp when the order was last updated

status.description: The current status of the order (OrderStatus enum)

type.description: The type of the order (OrderType enum)

limitPrice.description: The limit price for the order, if applicable

stopPrice.description: The stop price for the order, if applicable

fillVolume.description: The number of contracts filled on the order

filledPrice.description: The price at which the order was filled, if any

customTag.description: The custom tag associated with the order, if any

startTimestamp.description: The start of the timestamp filter

endTimestamp.description: The end of the timestamp filter

ticks.description: Number of ticks for stop loss

type.description: Type of stop loss bracket (OrderType enum)

ticks.description: Number of ticks for take profit

type.description: Type of take profit bracket (OrderType enum)

limitPrice.description: The limit price for the order, if applicable

stopPrice.description: The stop price for the order, if applicable

trailPrice.description: The trail price for the order, if applicable

customTag.description: An optional custom tag for the order. Must be unique across the account

orderId.description: The ID of the placed order

size.description: The new size of the order

limitPrice.description: The new limit price for the order, if applicable

stopPrice.description: The new stop price for the order, if applicable

trailPrice.description: The new trail price for the order, if applicable

accountId.description: The account associated with the position

contractId.description: The contract ID associated with the position

creationTimestamp.description: The timestamp when the position was created or opened

type.description: The type of the position (PositionType enum): 0=Undefined, 1=Long, 2=Short

averagePrice.description: The average price of the position

accountId.description: The account ID associated with the trade

contractId.description: The contract ID on which the trade occurred

creationTimestamp.description: The timestamp when the trade was created

price.description: The price at which the trade was executed

profitAndLoss.description: The total profit and loss of the trade (null indicates a half-turn trade)

fees.description: The total fees associated with the trade

orderId.description: The order ID associated with the trade

startTimestamp.description: The start of the timestamp filter

endTimestamp.description: The end of the timestamp filter

post.description: Authenticates a user using username and API key. Returns a JWT session token valid for 24 hours.
Authenticates an application using admin credentials, appId, and verifyKey. Returns a JWT session token valid for 24 hours.
Validates an existing session token and returns a new token if the current one is expired. Tokens are valid for 24 hours.
Search for accounts associated with the authenticated user.
Search for contracts by name. Returns up to 20 contracts at a time.
Search for a specific contract by its ID.
Lists all available contracts based on the provided request parameters.
Retrieve historical OHLCV bars. Maximum of 20,000 bars per request. Rate limited to 50 requests per 30 seconds.
Search for orders within a specified time range.
Search for currently open orders for an account.
Place a new order with optional stop loss and take profit brackets.
Search for open positions for an account.
Close an entire position for a specific contract.
Partially close a position for a specific contract.
Search for trades within a specified time range.

user.description: Provides real-time updates to a user's accounts, orders, positions, and trades

market.description: Provides market data such as quotes, trades, and DOM events

x-rateLimits.description: Rate limiting system for all authenticated requests

exceededResponse.description: Too Many Requests - reduce request frequency and retry after a short delay
